data.text:
한국에서의 비행기 자체가 늦게 도착하거나 아침에 도착하는 편명밖에 없어서 늦게 도착했습니다. 그럼에도 도어에서 환영과 엘레베이터까지의 안내, 체크인 하면서 late check out 오퍼와 함께 먼저 요청하지 않아도 먼저 캐치하여 안내해주는 세심한 서비스들이 많습니다. 객실 뷰 또한 고층이다보니 좋았으며 객실도 엄청 넓고 좋은 컨디션을 유지하고 있습니다. 

Thanks for the FD staff who assisted me for checking in ( I should ask her name but I couldnt), and she even escorted me to the room & all of the Concierge team that they communicated with me in email in advance regarding the tour information (especially Nazam Shahzad who communicated on email with me)
data.title: First time in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Koon-Parkss,
Thank you for your kind review.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and glad to know that you were impressed with the high level of service provided by our team members in the hotel.  Thank you for recognizing Nazem for his excellent service, rest assured that we will recognize him for the efforts.  We look forward to welcoming you back Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre in the near future.
Kind regards,
Victor Chalfoun
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Chalfoun

data.text: The best decision I made during my trip to the UAE was to stay at the Waldorf Astoria Dubai international Financial Centre. The facilities and rooms are excellent and the service is very considerate. The only thing I want to point out is that Wen was the best part of our trip. My parents didn't speak English, and Wen took care of them every morning, and she remembered all their preferences. On our check-out day, she even wrote a menu in both Chinese and English for my parents as she wasn’t working in that morning.  She was considerate not only of my parents, who did not speak English, but also of her colleagues, who did not speak Chinese. Five-star hotels do not rely on hotel facilities and hotel design, what can really impress guests is the staff themselves. Thank you Wen for the wonderful memories. Because of you, we will definitely choose Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Center when we come to Dubai.
data.title: Wen Zeng is amazing!!!!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gaoh681,
Thank you for your kind review.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and glad to know that you were impressed with the high level of service provided by our team members in the hotel.  Thank you for recognizing Wen for her incredible efforts in making yours and your parents stay comfortable and memorable, rest assured that we will recognize her for greatly for the efforts.  We look forward to welcoming you back Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre in the near future.
Kind regards,
Victor Chalfoun
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Chalfoun

data.text:
The staff are superb, the amenities excellent. I couldn't fault the experience and if you have Honors Diamond, there are additional perks you don't even expect. During Ramadan you may be lucky to get upgraded well, since the hotel is less busy at this time.

Remember, as always, arrogant and entitled travellers get less than kind amdgenerous ones. Smile and be polite.
data.title: Very personal service from a more business orientated hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PaulkH746OF,
Thank you for your excellent review.  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and you were overall satisfied with the services and facilities offered at the hotel.  It is our commitment to ensure our guests feel welcomed and are taken care of by our colleagues so that they have memorable experiences.  We are grateful for your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back to Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre in the near future. 
Kind regards,
Victor Chalfoun
General Manager
owner_response.author: Victor Chalfoun

data.text: The hotel was nice it was in the middle of the city where by I can go to do shopping in Dubai mall also the staffs where amazing I have never see amazing staffs in  my travels , they where helpful thanks to Sofia  assist to upgrade my room and Martin for giving me more information about Dubai . In Miami the United States staffs don’t help so much like here , soon I will come back
data.title: Amazing staffs and helpful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jeffrey B,
Thank you for your excellent review.  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and you were overall satisfied with the services and facilities offered at the hotel.  It is our commitment to ensure our guests feel welcomed and are taken care of by our colleagues so that they have memorable experiences. We are grateful for your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back to Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre in the near future.

data.text: The Location staff and hotel is one of the best in Dubai, located ready all the best restaurants and largest Shopping mall area… the staff are very professional will never leave you until satisfied… will go beyond their capabilities if they have too …. Duty manager Ms. Nobu is like a star in this property who will go beyond any expectations … Ms. Rachelle is another manager who will do her best to accommodate and ensure you are happy … Thank You for everything … this is a special appreciation to Nobu and Rachelle
data.title: Stars of the property Nobu & Rachelle

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 406hadia,
Thank you for posting your review following your stay at Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and you were overall satisfied with the services and facilities offered at the hotel.  Thank you for recognizing Nobu and Rachelle for their excellent service, rest assured that we will recognize them for their efforts.  We are grateful for your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the not too distant future.
Kind regards,
Victor Chalfoun
General Manager
